transcript.text: Do you want to shape the future of
Estan? You can. [clears throat] You can
contribute to a smart science for
sustainable future and circular economy.
You can make our world a safer and
better place to live. You can support
and inspire the education of girls and
women in STEM. Please join us in the
STEM prototyping startup project at
Swimber. You will develop skills in
communicating of the research you are
passionate about an essential part of
building employability. You will inform
the community of the good you're doing
and promote
community knowledge as a powerful force.
My name is Beta and I'm the convenor of
science communication in the school of
science and I would like to invite you
all to join us in design for change
competition in 2021.
Thank you.
>> Hi, my name is Elliot and I am a
prototyping coach at the design factory
Melbourne. I'd like to invite you to
participate in this project to improve
your communication, critical thinking,
real world problem solving capability,
creativity, leadership, and confidence
in working in a multi-disiplinary team
and more. The project will involve a
STEM focused educational tool or an app
or website focused on one of the IG
themes of inclusion, diversity, and
belonging, worldleading customer service
experience, climate change, or improving
the life of everyday people. Your group
of three to five participants final
submission due in late May will be a
4-minute pitch presentation in the
format of a video supporting your
design. These projects will be supported
by three workshops, Adobe Illustrator,
Adobe XD, and an Adobe Rush workshop
which will give you the tools you need
to complete the projects. Good luck and
hope to see you at the workshops.
For the best innovative prototype design
and startup video production, the
winning team will receive a cash prize
of $1,000. They will also get to
participate in the week in the life of a
technology professional experience
supported by I A. In addition, story of
the winning team success will be
published in the Swinburn newsletter and
each team member will receive a
certificate of recognition through the
Swinburn emerging leader program. This
can be for campus participation,
community engagement or industry
experience. My name is Kasna. I am the
chair of the department of computer
science and software engineering. I look
forward to seeing your design for
change. Good luck.
